title: Print, "Cloisonnée (Shippo), No. 17", ca. 1910
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 17 / Shippo.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves in varying shades of light blue; inner leaves in light purple with deep purple tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Cloisonnée (Shippo), No. 17", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 41 x 27.9 cm (16 1/8 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-71.
